mapper.sql: /*[TsysBatchLog.xml][select][TANINE]*/ SELECT LOG_SEQ , BATCH_SEQ , BATCH_RSLT_CD , BATCH_LOG_1_CTS , BATCH_LOG_2_CTS , BATCH_ST_DT , BATCH_ED_DT , BATCH_WRK_ST_DT , BATCH_WRK_ED_DT , SELECT_CNT , UPDATE_CNT , DELETE_CNT , INSERT_CNT , CRTR_ID , CRT_DTTM , UPDR_ID , UPD_DTTM FROM TSYS_BATCH_LOG WHERE LOG_SEQ = #{log_seq, jdbcType=NUMERIC}
mapper.select: /*[TsysBatchLog.xml][selectTsysBatchDetail][배치 로그 상세 조회][TANINE]*/ SELECT LOG_SEQ , BATCH_SEQ , BATCH_RSLT_CD , BATCH_LOG_1_CTS , BATCH_LOG_2_CTS , BATCH_WRK_ST_DT , BATCH_WRK_ED_DT , SELECT_CNT , UPDATE_CNT , DELETE_CNT , INSERT_CNT , CRTR_ID , DATE_FORMAT(CRT_DTTM, '%Y-%m-%d') AS CRT_DTTM , UPDR_ID , DATE_FORMAT(UPD_DTTM, '%Y-%m-%d') AS UPD_DTTM , DATE_FORMAT(BATCH_WRK_ST_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') AS F_BATCH_WRK_ST_DT , DATE_FORMAT(BATCH_WRK_ED_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') AS F_BATCH_WRK_ED_DT , DATE_FORMAT(BATCH_ST_DT, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') AS F_BATCH_ST_DT , DATE_FORMAT(BATCH_ED_DT, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') AS F_BATCH_ED_DT FROM TSYS_BATCH_LOG WHERE LOG_SEQ = #{log_seq, jdbcType=NUMERIC}
